title: The Date
description: Tawny, aka The Happy Spinster, returns!Although she is still wondering what is going to happen with her cowboy, her best friend, Teresa, convinces her that maybe she better release all her 'pent up energy' before she completely loses it!However, Tawny is not yet ready to be with another man. Being the curious lady that she is, she considers finding another woman to satisfy her needs.Teresa suggests an on-line dating site to find the arrangement she is hoping to find.She meets Jenny. The two women meet in a bar.While Tawny & Jenny are getting to know each other, a sweet & sexy guy, Dale, literally gets in the middle of the two women when he meets them in the lounge area of the bar, sitting next to each other on a cosy love seat.Now we have Tawny, Jenny & Dale.Although two is company,Three is not always a crowd,Or is it?
author: Karena Marie
